pageProps.content:
Experience

The Royal Livingstone, like the name suggests, is a 5-star hotel situated on the banks of the Zambezi River in Zambia, within walking distance to The Falls.
This charming hotel offers the discerning traveler an elegant & refined colonial ambience with world class service & countless activities.
The Royal Livingstone is the closest hotel to The Falls on the Zambian side & therefore guests can see the waterfall’s spray from the hotel veranda. The edge of The Falls can be seen from the sun deck & there is direct access to the world wonder from the hotel grounds.

Stay

Luxurious accommodation at The Royal Livingstone consists of 173 rooms set in colonial-style villas under the shade of acacia trees on the banks of the Zambezi River, offering gorgeous views of the river & surrounding forest.
These en-suite rooms are divided between premier rooms, deluxe rooms, deluxe corner rooms & suites.
The suites also include separate lounge areas. The Presidential Suite is ideal for friends or family traveling together as it boasts 2 luxurious bedrooms, a lounge & private terrace.
The gracious main area features an elegant dining room, lounge, veranda overlooking the lawns, hotel bar, sundeck as well as a swimming pool looking out over the mighty Zambezi River.

Activities

Activities at Victoria Falls include elephant interactions, microlight flights over the Falls, river rafting, canoe safaris on the mighty Zambezi River, day trips to Livingstone Island, swimming at Devil’s Pool & much more.
Guests can also enjoy massages, manicures & pedicures next to the pool.

subfolders.title: David Livingstone Lodge
subfolders.description: David Livingstone Lodge & Spa is centrally located only 5km from the town of Livingstone in Zambia & offers a unique location with breathtaking views. As the name suggests, the majestic waterfall was discovered by the famous explorer, Dr David Livingstone in 1855 & is a must-see for guests visiting Zambia.

subfolders.title: Royal Chundu
subfolders.description: Zambia’s family-owned & run Royal Chundu is set on a private stretch of riverbank on the the Zambezi River, just upstream of the iconic Victoria Falls. Royal Chundu consists of 2 lodges – River Lodge & Island Lodge, & as the name suggests, both properties are fit for royalty.  Ideal for honeymooners, couples or families, Royal Chundu is all about exceeding expectations.

subfolders.title: Sanctuary Sussi & Chuma
subfolders.description: Sanctuary Sussi & Chuma is a tree-fort safari lodge set on a dramatic bend of the Zambezi River within the game-packed Mosi-Oa-Tunya Park, upstream from the legendary Victoria Falls. Named after Dr David Livingstone’s knowledgeable & local guides, Sussi & Chuma is a laid-back, family-friendly lodge where guests can enjoy the park’s peace & tranquility, while still being close enough to the action-packed Victoria Falls with all its fun-filled activities.

subfolders.title: Sindabezi Island Lodge
subfolders.description: Sindabezi Island Lodge is an exclusive camp offering luxurious island accommodation just upstream from the majestic Victoria Falls on the Zambian side. A romantic hideaway with only 5 chalets & extraordinary river views, Sindabezi mixes romance with exclusivity & offers a range of fantastic fully inclusive activities.

subfolders.title: Taita Falcon Lodge
subfolders.description: Taita Falcon Lodge is set above the mighty Zambezi River, overlooking its winding waters & the dramatic cliffs of the Batoka Gorge.   This Zambian wilderness retreat is all about the views!  With its vast viewing platform, it is the perfect place to sit & take in Zambia’s scenic vistas.

subfolders.title: The Royal Livingstone
subfolders.description: The Royal Livingstone, like the name suggests, is a 5-star hotel situated on the banks of the Zambezi River in Zambia, within walking distance to The Falls. This charming hotel offers the discerning traveler an elegant & refined colonial ambience with world class service & countless activities.

subfolders.title: Thorntree River Lodge
subfolders.description: Thorntree River Lodge, one of Zambia’s most contemporary lodges boasts a spectacular setting on the legendary Zambezi River, just upstream from Zambia’s biggest drawcard:  the mighty Victoria Falls. Thorntree has an eco-concious design that incorporates nature & 21-century living.

subfolders.title: Toka Leya
subfolders.description: Toka Leya is a secluded luxury tented camp located 12km upstream from Victoria Falls & enjoys a beautiful location on the banks of the Zambezi River in Zambia. Set within the Mosi-oa-Tunya National Park, this unique tented camp is the ideal place to stay for those wishing to enjoy magnificent scenery, river views & plenty of activities – while being close enough to experience the majestic Victoria Falls.

subfolders.title: Tongabezi Lodge
subfolders.description: Tongabezi Lodge in Zambia is set on the banks of the mighty Zambezi River & offers secluded & luxurious accommodation just upstream from the majestic Victoria Falls. A romantic hideaway with extraordinary river views, Tongabezi mixes romance with exclusivity & is the ideal destination for the discerning traveler looking for romance, tranquility & beautiful scenery.
